attributes.action: Subsidise community projects in third world countries for children in full-time education (16-18)
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The concept of subsidising community projects for children in full-time education (16-18) would be influential in increasing awareness of our young people, as well as broadening children's horizons both spiritually and morally. All who have participated in schemes like those of World Challenge and Camps International have achieved a huge amount, and it's a great way to give something back to a community pleading for immediate help.
